I think you are missing the lesson that laliberte is teaching us here: if you considered Marin as your waifu and got hurt by this story, you need to understand that every guy and their mothers wanted to break her ass lmao. The way she dresses, the way she is dolled up, the way she acts…Everyone wanted to break her ass at some point. So, it was seriously arrogant of you to think she would be only yours. Next time you choose a waifu, take one who is dressed correctly and who doesn’t act slutty but I guess that doesn’t exist,so each of these sluts waifu would irl cheat on their boyfriends at some point. Think about it, why would those waifu stay faithful to you when irl every guy she encounters would get hard and some try to do her? You can’t compete in long term. Mb there is no lust in heaven but we are on earth here guys. So, dress up your girlfriends, don’t let her meet guys and put make up or you will 100% get cucked at some point. That’s the lesson of this story from laliberte, Amen.

Remember, in every wholesome romcom anime, someone will definitely make an NTR version of it. It's just natural, and NTR is actually a good genre. 
Still, the fact that "a wholesome character" was used in a "not-so-wholesome" doujin, does get into the fans nerves, sometimes makes them uncomfortable. It does happens to me, but by simply thinking that "this is a doujin", I can pretty much fap to it. So yes, this ain't bad.
